Package de.feu.massim22.group3.utils

Class DirectionUtil

java.lang.Object
de.feu.massim22.group3.utils.DirectionUtil
public class DirectionUtil extends Object
The Class DirectionUtil contains static methods to convert Between string directions, int code directions and Point directions.
Author:
Melinda Betz, Heinz Stadler, Phil Heger (minor contribution)

      agent - - the agent
      Returns:

    • normalizePointOntoMap

      public static Point normalizePointOntoMap(Point p, Point mapSize)
      Points can have negative values because the map edges can be traversed. This method provides the point with positive coordinates
      Parameters:
      p - point to be normalized
      mapSize - x and y dimensions of the map
      Returns:
      normalized point p with only positive coordinates

    • pointsWithinDistance

      public static boolean pointsWithinDistance(Point p1, Point p2, Point mapSize, int distance)
      Check if two points are within the given distance. The vicinity is also checked over the map edges because the map edges can be traversed.
      Parameters:
      p1 - point 1
      p2 - point 2
      mapSize - size of the game map
      distance - Manhatten distance for the vicinity check
      Returns:
      true if distance is smaller or equal to the given distance value

    • setMapSize

      public static void setMapSize(int x, int y)
      Sets the map size.
      Parameters:
      x - the with of the map
      y - the height of the map
